commands.name: az network express-route gateway create
commands.syntax:
az network express-route gateway create --name
                                        --resource-group
                                        [--allow-non-vwan-traffic {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--location]
                                        [--max-val]
                                        [--min-val]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--tags]
                                        [--virtual-hub]
examples: az network express-route gateway create --name MyExpressRouteGateway --resource-group MyResourceGroup --min-val 5

commands.name: az network express-route gateway delete
commands.syntax:
az network express-route gateway delete [--ids]
                                        [--name]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--subscription]
examples: az network express-route gateway delete --name MyExpressRouteGateway --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network express-route gateway list
examples: az network express-route gateway list --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network express-route gateway show
commands.summary: Get the details of an ExpressRoute gateway.
examples: az network express-route gateway show --name MyExpressRouteGateway --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network express-route gateway update
commands.summary: Update settings of an ExpressRoute gateway.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route gateway update [--add]
                                        [--allow-non-vwan-traffic {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--ids]
                                        [--location]
                                        [--max-val]
                                        [--min-val]
                                        [--name]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--remove]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--set]
                                        [--subscription]
                                        [--tags]
                                        [--virtual-hub]
examples: az network express-route gateway update --name MyExpressRouteGateway --resource-group MyResourceGroup --min-val 3

commands.name: az network express-route gateway wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
